documents.document: The text in this illustration translates as "harmony and coexistence". Proud to be a part of Intercom. ❤
Small, but mighty. ❤ https://t.co/Ouw6StxIBu
@drrrop duly noted.
@drrrop I have actually gone over my handlebars like that though 🤕
The Guardian, mincing no words this morning. Worth reading (and contributing, if you can): https://t.co/oklEdgWcUw
@missellabell that gif alone helped heaps. A+, will tune in again tomorrow. 😊
Donating takes less than two minutes and you can do it from anywhere in the world: https://t.co/rRaeoeZl2P

Including green card holders. Shameful, upsetting, infuriating. https://t.co/PVeAkuLWlD
@mostlyalia I knocked the item on the left over leaving last week; think I'm cursed now?

@jmason oh hang on. It's the visa *interview* waiver program. For now.
*exhales slightly*
@LaurenCullen @JuicyLucy whoop! Welcome, Lucy 😊

@RichieMcCormack who knew songs about airport bars could be so dreamy?

@buttonmoon1979 I woke up singing 'Another Day of Sun' this morning. Which, to be fair, is a pretty great way to wake up. 🌞🚗💃
Loved listening to @swissmiss chatting to @stewartsc about community, the art of sales, and working motherhood 🙌🏻 https://t.co/O905vXuZYc

Is there a support group yet for people who can't stop listening to the La La Land soundtrack?
(If not, I'm starting one.)
@ciaran_lee ack! Feels like a total bait and switch. 🙁
@drrrop yeah, considering the UX Apple and Netflix have familiarised people with. Feels like a real bait and switch.
@drrrop I even downloaded the app to see if it'd make a difference. Nope. Cancelled!
@drrrop I have been asking it the same question. Repeatedly. :(
@robpegoraro my point was more about the disconnect between listings in UI and actual cleared library for Ireland, though. V frustrating!
@robpegoraro started out using the Android app. May have to, um, explore alternatives.
Ten minutes in to an Amazon Prime trial and it's breaking my heart. Enough with the geo-blocking trickery already. 😭 https://t.co/uMf9Dqnv7w

@PleasureBeachHQ @jamesvmcmorrow @Soakofficial cheering extra loud for you guys in the Olympia tonight 🙌
Bloody hell. https://t.co/a4yUAHSTwe
@missellabell you are extraordinary people, both of you, and a testament to good things happening to good people. We will all hang in there.
I was doing so well on the not-crying front until I read this. https://t.co/aMjZhTxSIV
@conways Hooray! Congrats - hope you're all doing well x
@neasaconneally plus in this case developers get tax €€€ and they don't have to worry about social housing provisions. Ugh.
@neasaconneally still don't think a 7 storey behemoth is the best thing for that site, mind.
@neasaconneally ah the whole complex is desperately outdated. We're getting a new Lidl up the road next month though 💅
@suzybie Section 23 incentives and no social housing provisions - developers must be *delighted*.
(The full planning application is here: https://t.co/6ILfErVaUA)

@garyimbibe @sweetoblivion26 on the list!
@sweetoblivion26 @garyimbibe aw shucks! 😊
@garyimbibe @sweetoblivion26 totally smitten with it here too. She's got an extraordinary voice.

@susanbrodigan I am now one of Those People who sings while cycling. Stoneybatter got an earful of City of Stars this morning 🙊
@LightHouseD7 thanks a million!
@LightHouseD7 this is it! Fingers crossed 😊 https://t.co/yc90ww5MUj
@LightHouseD7 hello! 👋 Do you guys have a lost & found stash anywhere there, by chance? Lost a brooch in screen 1 on Saturday night 😞
@gavreilly 's OK, Ticketmaster have kindly listed a bunch of them for over 2x face value on Seatwave already 🙄 https://t.co/vlc9sTt8VY
@neasaconneally I got weepy this morning just thinking about that last sequence! Glorious, colourful film.
Absolutely adored La La Land. Old school Hollywood movie magic at its finest. 😍
@AhHere @smcs all nighters making project posters in the school during Christmas hols and 6am starts for the train to the RDS? Yep 🙈
@codinami Dangerous is a standout for me! Also: new Bonobo album. We are spoiled today (cc @Malik) 😊
@free2panik @intercom WHOOP! Lucky us 🎉
Who said Friday the 13th was an unlucky day? #OnRepeat https://t.co/BQNn5whcbp

Little A: "I think Elsa came one night and froze all the sky, and that's where we get snow!"
Disney, you've got a lot to answer for.
SNOOOOOOOOOWWWWWW! And it's sticking! https://t.co/yQI2s5zO6L
@pwquinn he is on the case, to be fair. (I wake up every morning with the theme song in my head, send help)
(Aside: I get to be Everest because my daughter is Skye, and the other five pups in the Patrol are all male. Sigh.)

Weeks I have now spent parenting in character as Everest from Paw Patrol: 4.
(And counting)
@philatom looked familiar alright :) They're great!
@philatom ha! (Toucanbox?)
@neasaconneally ah here, thanks! The dress is v v comfy. I may have bought a second one in a different pattern 🙊
@neasaconneally hello dress twin 🙋

@sweetoblivion26 @TrampPress ah, I'm half way through it at the mo! Will stockpile Kleenex.
Happy Nollaig na mBan, great gals of Twitter. I learn something new from y'all every day. 👯 https://t.co/6MVbdhT2A3
@LooraKennedy also YAY for people who care about this stuff. Being pregnant invites ridiculous questions from friends and strangers alike.
@LooraKennedy a general "congrats! hope you're feeling well" goes a long way and will prompt what she's comfortable sharing at this stage.
@LaurenCullen happy interversary! ❤
@KathyFoley Eamon and the bunnies...! So very well cast, and the songs are spot on.
@susanbrodigan I hope you're not wearing contact lenses today. 😱
@blatherina and also with you 🙏
@andrewmanganVO the lads are absolute gems. So much heart in it.
Finally getting around to watching Sing Street (thanks, Netflix). SO good. https://t.co/LE5Hoa2Fuf

@davecullinan *highly* recommend the Aleppine potatoes. And the baked falafel. 😍
@SarahJayBee I blame the Happy Pear lads tbh. (Came quite close to doing it today myself 🙈)
@cathalhoran @hughdurkin The West Wing ain't got nothing on Team Dev Platform 😊

@stewartsc (I'm so sorry. Levity needed!)

@jaycee001 I do remember MT:USA, if that's any consolation 😊
@stewartsc man's impending descent in to blithering idiocy?
@stewartsc light entertainment, or surrealist meisterwerk? We may never know...
@msleedy I suspect you're right.
@emjmeehan I'd say Mella's trifle is heavy on the sherry 💅
I'd never seen this dress rehearsal footage before. What a showman. (And there's Bowie in the background) https://t.co/FtvDMIXsta
Hard to imagine anyone paying tribute to George Michael as flawlessly as he did to Freddie Mercury. What an absolut… https://t.co/wYoCz8GGD9
England gets the Queen's speech, we get magical, brilliant @LisaHannigan on the radio. I think I know who's winning here. (RTE R1 RIGHT NOW)
@urchinette ha! I have a ranty thinkpiece brewing about latent gender bias in PP, but perhaps one for another day :) Happy Christmas!
I, for one, welcome our new canine/robot overlords. https://t.co/qqxyUHTaBo
"No, we can't set a place at the table for the minion, we don't have enough room" - an actual sentence I have uttered this afternoon. 🙊
@stephenwmcevoy please do! House is heaving with cake and mince pies 😁

@stephenwmcevoy *waves*
Call in for a cuppa tomorrow if you've time!
@stephenwmcevoy hang on are you working in the Navan Road branch of Insomnia?
@wholesomeIE oh Caitriona. So relieved and thrilled to see this. Happy Christmas 😊
@AlisonTodayFM Liberty Bell! It's Christmas now alright 🎄🎅💕
It's been one heck of a year at @intercom (and I've only been here for ten months of it!) Dead excited for 2017 ✨ https://t.co/0MD6I8KEmf
@LisaHannigan Done, and worth every cent ❤
